name: Solar Pearl
desc: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon, and pulses with a warm strength.
skill_desc: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by  20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 6s.
